show.name: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie (15)
show.long_description:
Time tbc | UK | Dir. Mandie Fletcher | Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley, Julia Sawalha, Rebel Wilson

For their big screen debut, Edina and Patsy are still oozing glitz and glamour, living the high life they are accustomed to; shopping, drinking and clubbing their way around London’s trendiest hotspots. Blamed for a major incident at a fashionable launch party, they become entangled in a media storm and are relentlessly pursued by the paparazzi. Fleeing penniless to the glamorous playground of the super-rich, the French Riviera, they hatch a plan to make permanent their escape and live the high life forever more!
show.short_description: Time tbc | UK | Dir. Mandie Fletcher | Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley, Julia Sawalha, Rebel Wilson For their big screen debut, Edina and Patsy ...

show.name: An Evening for Jon Morgan
show.long_description:
An Evening for Jon Morgan

Wyeside Arts Centre and The Friends of Wyeside invite you to an informal evening of music, drama and spoken word voice to celebrate the life of Wyeside’s inspirational former Director Jonathon Morgan - who died earlier this year. The programme will feature contributions from The Willow Globe, Builth Wells Community Arts, Builth Wells High School, Mid Powys Youth Theatre, family and friends.

Join us for this live informal cabaret style evening and help celebrate Jonathon’s memory.

All proceeds from the evening will go to Wyeside Arts Centre’s ‘Jonathon Morgan Fund’ in aid of arts education at Wyeside.
show.short_description: An Evening for Jon Morgan Wyeside Arts Centre and The Friends of Wyeside invite you to an informal evening of music, drama and spoken word voice to ...

show.name: André Rieu: Christmas with André
show.long_description:
Christmas with André, a festive celebration, packed with Christmas favourites including Hallelujah, Jingle Bells, White Christmas, Amazing Grace and many more!

André invites his fans to his hometown with an intimate live tour of Maastricht’s magical Christmas highlights, as well as participating in an interactive Q&A hosted by Charlotte Hawkins.
show.short_description: Christmas with André, a festive celebration, packed with Christmas favourites including Hallelujah, Jingle Bells, White Christmas, Amazing Grace and ...

show.name: Bad Moms (15)
show.long_description:
Director: Scott Moore, Jon Lucas. Starring: Mila Kunis, Kathryn Hahn, Kristen Bell, Christina Applegate, Jada Pinkett Smith, Annie Mumolo

101 Mins. USA

Seth Rogen, Lisa Kudrow and Zac Efron star in this neighbourly adult comedy. Kelly and Mac are settling down in a quiet neighborhood with their newborn child, until a couple of noisy guys – Teddy and Pete - move into the house next door. When Teddy goes back on his word to keep the partying down, Mac calls the police to deal with the problem, but the police quickly blame Mac for their presence. A war begins and things get hilariously dangerous.
show.short_description: Director: Scott Moore, Jon Lucas. Starring: Mila Kunis, Kathryn Hahn, Kristen Bell, Christina Applegate, Jada Pinkett Smith, Annie Mumolo 101 ...

show.name: Ben-Hur (12A)
show.long_description:
Time 123mins | USA | Dir. Timur Bekmambetov

Jack Huston, Toby Kebbell, Morgan Freeman

The epic story of Judah Ben-Hur (Huston), a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother Messala (Kebbell), an officer in the Roman army. Stripped of his title, separated from his family and the woman he loves, Judah is forced into slavery. After years at sea, Judah returns to his homeland to seek revenge, but an encounter with Jesus leads him to the Crucifixion, where he discovers forgiveness and finds redemption.
show.short_description: Time 123mins | USA | Dir. Timur Bekmambetov Jack Huston, Toby Kebbell, Morgan Freeman The epic story of Judah Ben-Hur (Huston), a prince falsely ...

show.name: Bridget Jones's Baby (TBC)
show.long_description:
Time tbc | UK, France, Ireland, USA | Dir. Sharon Maguire

Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth, Emma Thompson

After breaking up with Darcy, Bridget Jones's "happily ever after" hasn't gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job and surround herself with old friends and new and for once, Bridget seems to have everything completely under control. Then Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch...she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

show.name: Captain Fantastic (15)
show.long_description:
Time (TBC) | USA | Dir. Matt Ross

Viggo Mortensen, Frank Langella, Kathryn Hahn

Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, isolated from society, a devoted father Ben (Mortensen) dedicates his life to transforming his six young children into extraordinary adults. But when tragedy strikes the family, the family is forced to leave this self-created paradise and make a journey into the outside world. It’s a journey that will challenge Ben’s idea of what it means to be a parent, and cause everyone to question just what values are important in a family.

show.name: Classical Music: Dragonfly Ensemble & Helen Crayford
David Brent: Life On The Road (15)
show.long_description:
Time 96 mins | UK | Dir. Ricky Gervais

Ricky Gervais, Jo Hartley, Mandeep Dhillon

Twelve years ago, David Brent (Gervais) was the star of the British TV reality series, "The Office". He’s now working as a sales rep, but he hasn’t given up his dream of becoming a singer and is going on tour with his band while once again being filmed as part of a “Where are they now?”-style documentary. Assembling a group of mercenary session musicians, a talented sidekick for street cred and an overpriced yet underwhelmed tour manager, he embarks upon his self-financed UK tour.
show.short_description: Time 96 mins | UK | Dir. Ricky Gervais Ricky Gervais, Jo Hartley, Mandeep Dhillon Twelve years ago, David Brent (Gervais) was the star of the ...

show.name: Eduardo Niebla
show.long_description:
EDUARDO NIEBLA IN CONCERT

If you don’t know the stunning guitar playing of Eduardo Niebla, you’re in for a treat. If you are already among his admirers around the world, you know you have something quite extraordinary in store. The virtuoso Spanish guitarist makes music that transcends genres & crosses barriers, fusing flamenco gypsy jazz with an array of classical & Indian colours. Eduardo’s appearances include the Queen Elizabeth Hall London, the Cairo Jazz Festival, the Jaipur Festival India & Glastonbury and he takes to the stage a maestro artist at the top of his game.

"A stunning collection of originals...showing what Jelly Roll Morton called 'the Spanish tinge' is still a potent force". (Jazz UK)

“Poignantly poetic... and truly breathtaking” (SCOTSMAN)

“Exquisite guitar playing” (GUARDIAN)
show.short_description: EDUARDO NIEBLA IN CONCERT If you don’t know the stunning guitar playing of Eduardo Niebla, you’re in for a treat. If you are already among his ...

show.name: Finding Dory 2D (U)
show.long_description:
Time 103 | USA | Dir. Andrew Stanton, Angus MacLane

Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks, Idris Elba

Following on from Pixar’s classic hit ‘Finding Nemo’, Finding Dory reunites everyone’s favorite forgetful fish Dory with her friends Nemo and Marlin. . A year after the events of 'Finding Nemo', Dory wakes up and sees a picture in her head. She has remembered something! This causes her to embarks on a mission in search of her long-lost mum and dad and answer some important questions about her past. What can she remember? Where are her parents? And where did she learn to speak Whale? Join Dory and friends on this, their latest unforgettable adventure.

show.name: Florence Foster Jenkins (PG)
show.long_description:
110 mins | UK | Dir. Stephen Frears | Meryl Streep, Hugh Grant, Simon Helberg

The inspirational true story of Florence Foster Jenkins (Streep), the legendary New York heiress and socialite who obsessively pursues her dream of becoming a great opera singer. But while the voice she hears in her head is beautiful, to everyone else it is hilariously awful, a fact her “husband” and manager, St Clair Bayfield (Grant) is determined to protect her from. But Florence is determined to fulfil her dream and perform in front of an audience. Her sights are set on Carnegie Hall, and she will sing there, come what may.
show.short_description: 110 mins | UK | Dir. Stephen Frears | Meryl Streep, Hugh Grant, Simon Helberg The inspirational true story of Florence Foster Jenkins (Streep), ...

show.name: Ghostbusters 2D (12A)
show.long_description:
Time 116 | USA | Dir. Paul Feig

Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones.

Ghostbusters makes its long-awaited return, rebooted with a cast of hilarious new characters. Thirty years after the beloved original franchise took the world by storm, director Paul Feig (Bridesmaids, Spy) brings his fresh take to the supernatural comedy. When ghosts start to invade Manhattan, it’s up to three scientists and a subway worker to save the world from a mysterious evil, a powerful demon known as Rowan who can exercise control over human.

show.name: Ice Age: Collision Course 2D (U)
show.long_description:
Time 94 mins| USA | Dir. Mike Thurmeier, Galen T. Chu

The latest entry in the hugely popular Ice Age series sees Scrat’s pursuit of the elusive acorn catapult him into space, where he accidentally sets off a series of cosmic events that threatens the Earth. In order to save their Ice Age world, Sid, Manny, Diego, and the rest of the herd must leave their home and embark on a new quest, full of laughter and adventure, as they travel to exotic new lands and encounter an old friend and some colorful new characters.

show.name: Jason Bourne (12A)
show.long_description:
Time tbc | USA | Dir. Paul Greengrass

Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, Tommy Lee Jones

Matt Damon returns in his most iconic role. Paul Greengrass, the director of The Bourne Supremacy and The Bourne Ultimatum, once again joins Damon for the next chapter of the Bourne franchise. Several years after his disappearance at the conclusion of The Bourne Ultimatum, Jason Bourne unexpectedly resurfaces at a time when the world is faced with unprecedented instability.

show.name: Jon Richardson: Work In Progress
show.long_description:
Come and see Jon Richardson as he works on his new material ahead of a major UK tour.

Away from his live stand up, the British Comedy Award 2013 Nominee is best known as team captain on ‘8 Out Of 10 Cats Does Countdown’. He is massively in demand for television and radio appearances and his recent TV credits include ‘Have I Got News For You’ (BBC ONE), ‘Live At The Apollo’ (BBC ONE), ‘Channel 4’s Comedy Gala Live At The 02’ and most recently ‘Taskmaster’ (DAVE). He also hosts ‘The Warm Up’ show on talkSPORT with Matt Forde every Saturday.

‘Jon Richardson is developing into a quietly sophisticated comedian who is at turns hilarious and disturbing and under no circumstances should you miss‘ ****The Mirror

‘one of our most individual and interesting stand-ups **** - The Times

'Sublimely brilliant, stunning.... Time Out

show.name: Julieta (15)
show.long_description:
Time 99’ | Spain | Dir. Pedro Almodóvar

Adriana Ugarte, Rossy de Palma, Michelle Jenner

Julieta is a 55 year old teacher whos daughter abandoned her when she was eighteen, and who Julieta hasn’t spoken to in the past twelve years. She decides to write a long letter to her daughter, Antía, trying to explain all the things she has kept secret from her over the last 30 years. However, when she has finished her confession, she realises she doesn’t know where to post the letter. As she begins to search for her, she comes to realise that Antía has become a total stranger to her.

show.name: Mike & Dave Need Wedding Dates (15)
show.long_description:
Time 98 mins | USA | Dir. Jake Szymanski

Anna Kendrick, Zac Efron, Adam Devine

Hard-partying brothers Mike and Dave consistantly ruin every family gathering, so their dad figures a couple of sweet girls will help keep them in line at their sister’s Hawaiian wedding. In response they decide to place an online ad to find their perfect dates for the event. What they end up with however is Tatiana and Alice, who turn out to be much, much more than they bargained for, as the boys find themselves outsmarted and out-partied by the uncontrollable duo.

show.name: Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children (TBC)
show.long_description:
Time tbc | USA, Belgium, UK | Dir. Tim Burton

Eva Green, Samuel L. Jackson, Asa Butterfield

Young Jacob Portman has grown up listening to his grandfather's tales about the residents of a mysterious orphanage known as Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiars. When the old man dies in mysterious circumstances, young Jacob sets out on an incredible adventure. What he finds at Miss Peregrines’s is a magical place, one whose residents possess astonishing abilities but are under threat from sinister monsters. Now it's up to Jacob to use his own 'peculiarity' to save them. Based upon the best-selling novel, Tim Burton’s latest offering has a stellar cast including Judi Dench, Chris O’Dowd and Terence Stamp.
show.short_description: Time tbc | USA, Belgium, UK | Dir. Tim Burton Eva Green, Samuel L. Jackson, Asa Butterfield Young Jacob Portman has grown up listening to ...

show.name: Molly Moon & The Incredible Book Of Hypnotism (PG)
show.long_description:
Time 98’ | UK | Dir. Christopher N. Rowley

Raffey Cassidy, Dominic Monaghan, Celia Imrie

The story of a young orphan girl who comes across a old book named 'Hypnotism, An Ancient Art'. When Molly Moon finds the book she uses its secrets to hypnotise her way to stardom in London and become rich and famous. But little does she know that an unscrupulous man knows her secret and wants the power of her book for himself. Kidnapping her little dog, he plans to blackmail Molly into stealing from one of the richest banks in London. Can Molly save her dog and save the day?
show.short_description: Time 98’ | UK | Dir. Christopher N. Rowley Raffey Cassidy, Dominic Monaghan, Celia Imrie The story of a young orphan girl who comes across a old ...

show.name: Nine Lives (PG)
show.long_description:
Time 87 mins | France, China | Dir. Barry Sonnenfeld

Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Garner, Christopher Walken

Billionaire Tom Brand’s workaholic lifestyle leaves him disconnected from his wife Lara and his daughter Rebecca, who wants a cat for her 11th birthday. Tom hates cats, but running out of time, he finds himself visiting a strange pet store and leaving with a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants. After getting into a terrible accident, Tom regains consciousness to find himself magically trapped inside the cat’s body. Adopted by his own family, Tom must figure out a way to become human again as he begins to experience what life is truly like.
show.short_description: Time 87 mins | France, China | Dir. Barry Sonnenfeld Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Garner, Christopher Walken Billionaire Tom Brand’s workaholic ...

show.name: NT Encore - The Deep Blue Sea
Pete's Dragon 2D (PG)
show.long_description:
Time 103mins | USA | Dir. David Lowery

Oakes Fegley, Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford

For years, old Mr. Meacham (Redford) has delighted local children with his tales of the fierce dragon that resides deep in the woods. To his daughter, Grace (Howard), these stories are little more than tall tales…until she meets Pete (Fegley). Pete is a mysterious 10-year-old with no family or home who claims to live in the woods with a giant, green dragon named Elliott, who seems remarkably similar to the dragon from Mr. Meacham’s stories.

Grace sets out to determine where Pete came from, where he belongs, and the truth about his dragon.

show.name: Sausage Party (15)
show.long_description:
89 Mins Cert 15 | USA | Dir. Greg Tiernan, Conrad Vernon

Paul Rudd, Kristen Wiig, Seth Rogen

An adult-only animated movie, about one lone sausage leading a group of supermarket products on a quest to discover the truth about their existence, and what really happens when they are chosen to leave the grocery store. The aptly named hot-dog Frank (Seth Rogen) eagerly awaits the day he’ll reach the “great beyond”, so he can be freed from his package to slip inside his sexy hot-dog bun girlfriend Brenda (Kristen Wiig). Featuring the vocal talents of a host of today’s comedy stars.

show.name: Seann Walsh: One For The Road
Star Trek Beyond 2D (12A)
show.long_description:
Time 122 mins | USA | Dir. Justin Lin

Chris Pine, Simon Pegg, Idris Elba

When the first leg of the USS Enterprise's five year mission takes them into uncharted territory, Kirk (Pine) and his crew find themselves stranded on a remote planet with no means of communication. With no apparent means of rescue, they find themselves in conflict with a new ruthless enemy who has a well-earned hatred of the Federation and what it stands for.

show.long_description:
Time 122 mins | USA | Dir. Justin Lin

Chris Pine, Simon Pegg, Idris Elba

When the first leg of the USS Enterprise's five year mission takes them into uncharted territory, Kirk (Pine) and his crew find themselves stranded on a remote planet with no means of communication. With no apparent means of rescue, they find themselves in conflict with a new ruthless enemy who has a well-earned hatred of the Federation and what it stands for.

show.name: Swallows & Amazons (PG)
show.long_description:
Time tbc | UK | Dir. Philippa Lowthorpe

Kelly Macdonald, Rafe Spall, Harry Enfield

While holidaying in the Lake District, four children sail their boat - the Swallow - towards a nearby island, unaware that it is the ‘territory’ of two rival children and their boat Amazon. For both groups the island soon becomes a world of imagination – one filled with pirates and canons, where boats are captured and the enemy has to walk the plank. But when family friend, Uncle Jim is revealed to be a spy, the motley crew are forced to put down their imaginary swords and band together to protect him from his Soviet enemies.

show.name: The BFG 2D (PG)
show.long_description:
Time 117 | USA, UK, Canada | Dir. Steven Spielberg

Ruby Barnhill, Mark Rylance, Bill Hader.

When a girl named Sophie encounters the BFG (Big Friendly Giant), despite his intimidating appearance he turns out to be a kindhearted soul. However he is considered an outcast by the other inhabitants of Giant Country, like Bloodbottler and Fleshlumpeater, who are twice as big, twice as scary and have been known to eat humans. Can Sophie help the BFG? Three of the world’s greatest storytellers – Roald Dahl, Walt Disney and Steven Spielberg –finally unite to bring this beloved classic to life.

show.name: The Curious Adventures Of Pinocchio - Lyngo Theatre
The Legend Of Tarzan 2D (12A)
show.long_description:
Time 110 mins | USA | Dir. David Yates

Alexander Skarsgård, Margot Robbie, Samuel L. Jackson,

It has been years since the man once known as Tarzan left the jungles of Africa behind and travel to England with his beloved wife Jane to become Lord Greystoke. Now, as he travels back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, he is unaware that he has become a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge. But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.
show.short_description: Time 110 mins | USA | Dir. David Yates Alexander Skarsgård, Margot Robbie, Samuel L. Jackson, It has been years since the man once known as Tarzan ...

show.name: Where To Invade Next (15)
show.long_description:
Time 118’ | USA | Dir. Michael Moore

Michael Moore, Krista Kiuru, Tim Walker

Michael Moore is back in a provocative and hilariously revealing comedy, during which he will stop at nothing to figure out how to actually make America great again. To show what the USA can learn from rest of the world, he sets out to visit various nations as a one-man "invader" to take their ideas and practices for America. Whether it is Italy’s generous vacation time, Germany’s industrial policy or Norway and its prison system, Moore confronts some of today’s most pressing issues and finds solutions in the most unlikely places.
